testcase.name: ri Api call for Legacy Ad
testcase.summary: Check ri API call for Legacy Ad.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app

2. Set ri enabled value true in request and map config file.

3. Initialise the app.

step.actions:
1. Install the App and set charles Proxy.  
2. Enter the valid Placement id's.
3. Initialise the App.
4. Load and play Incentivized Legacy Ad.
5. Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
1. ri API call should appear in Charles after completion of 75% of Legacy Ad.

(ri API - https://events.api.vungle.com/api/v5/ri )

testcase.name: Native Ad Flexview Close timer option.

1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.

5. Tap on close button while playing the Ad before specified time(20).
step.expectedresults: Ad should close properly when tap on close button.

step.actions:

testcase.name: view discrepancy
testcase.summary: Check and compare eventID in response of rquestAd and reportAd
testcase.preconditions:
1)Install Application
2)Set Charles Proxy
3)Initialize the application

step.actions:
1)Install the App on Android/iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter multiple placement ID.
3)Initialize the App and play the Ad.
4)Observe the event IDin response of requestAd and reportAd.
5)after playing Ad observe new event ID for new request. and kill the APP.
6)Reopen the App and play the Ad.
7)Observe the eventID in reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1) before killing App eventID should same in  response of requestAd and reportAd.
2)Before killing note down new requestAd's eventID it should same in reportAd when user reopen the app play the ad.

testcase.name: Log for interstitial/ rewarded.
testcase.summary: Check log gets generated.
testcase.preconditions:
Vungle MoPub Adapter QA Test app should be installed in device.

Interstitial/Rewarded AdUnit must be added.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.

2.Tap on load Ad.

3.Tap on Play Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For interstitial Ad-

1.While loading Ad-

LOAD INTERSTITIAL 1

interstitialDidLoadAd for 01

2.While playing Ad-

PLAY INTERSTITIAL 1

interstitialWillAppear for 01

interstitialDidAppear for 01

interstitialWillDisappear for 01

interstitialDidDisappear for 01

For Rewarded ad-

1.While loading ad-

Domain=MoPubRewardedVideoAdsSDKDomainCode=-1100"(null)"

rewardedVideoAdDidLoadForAdUnitID for 01

2.While playing ad-

PLAY REWARDED 1

rewardedVideoAdWillAppearForAdUnit for 01

rewardedVideoAdDid AppearForAdUnit for 01

rewardedVideoAdShouldRewardForAdUnitID for 01:

MPMoPubRewardedVideoRewardCurrencyType Unspecified, 0

rewardedVideoAdWillDisappearForAdUnitID for 01

rewardedVideoAdDidDisappearForAdUnitID for 01

testcase.name: Native Ad Flexview Close timer option.
testcase.summary: Manipulate Flexview Close timer parameter.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install app 
2. Initialize the app

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should stop/close at specified time.

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value as 20.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.

5. Tap on close button while playing the Ad before specified time(20).
step.expectedresults: Ad should close properly when tap on close button.

step.actions:
1. Launch the test app.

2. Navigate to Placement Id's Configuration.

3. Set a Flexview close timer value greater than '0' eg. 2/4/15.

4. Load and play the specific Ad.
step.expectedresults: Ad should stop/close at specified time.

testcase.name: view discrepancy
testcase.summary: Check and compare eventID in response of rquestAd and reportAd
testcase.preconditions:
1)Install Application
2)Set Charles Proxy
3)Initialize the application

step.actions:
1)Install the App on Android/iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter multiple placement ID.
3)Initialize the App and play the Ad.
4)Observe the event IDin response of requestAd and reportAd.
5)after playing Ad observe new event ID for new request. and kill the APP.
6)Reopen the App and play the Ad.
7)Observe the eventID in reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1) before killing App eventID should same in  response of requestAd and reportAd.
2)Before killing note down new requestAd's eventID it should same in reportAd when user reopen the app play the ad.

testcase.name: GDPR opted_in Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for opted_in GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Tap on the More option tab.
3.Configure "is_country_data_protected" parameter value as true in config APi response.
4.Load and play Ad.
5. On Concent pop up click on accept button
6. Observe report ad API
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as 'opted_in' in ads API.
3. Consent popup should not display when user play an Ad.

testcase.name: GDPR opted_out Status

step.actions:

2. Tap on the More option tab.

4. Load and play Ad.
5. On Concent popup click on Deny button
6. Observe that report ad AP
step.expectedresults:
1. GDPR parameter should display in Ads and ReportAd API.
2. Consent status should be displayed as 'opted_out' in ads API.

testcase.name: GDPR time_out Status
testcase.summary: Check for the API calls for time_out GDPR status
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. add parameter as "is_country_data_protected" as true in config ad
3. Map Gdpr parameter in config ad
4. Load and play Ad.
5. Do not click on popup button i.e. accept or deny
6. Kill app or close app
7. Observe report ad reesponse
step.expectedresults:
1. Multiple ads API should fire in charles.
2. GDPR parameter should display in request payload of Ads API.
3. Response of Ads API should contain null value.
4. Consent status should be displayed as'opted_out_by_timeout' in ads API request.

testcase.name: view discrepancy
testcase.summary: Check and compare eventID in response of rquestAd and reportAd
testcase.preconditions:
1)Install Application
2)Set Charles Proxy
3)Initialize the application

step.actions:
1)Install the App on Android/iOS device and set charles Proxy.  
2)Enter multiple placement ID.
3)Initialize the App and play the Ad.
4)Observe the event IDin response of requestAd and reportAd.
5)after playing Ad observe new event ID for new request. and kill the APP.
6)Reopen the App and play the Ad.
7)Observe the eventID in reportAd.
step.expectedresults:
1) before killing App eventID should same in  response of requestAd and reportAd.
2)Before killing note down new requestAd's eventID it should same in reportAd when user reopen the app play the ad.
